problem_names:
lemma left_commute[tts_ac_simps, tts_algebra_simps, field_simps]: 
  "b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)"
lemma add_left_cancel[simp]: "a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<longleftrightarrow> b = c"
lemma add_right_cancel[simp]: "b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<longleftrightarrow> b = c"
lemma bij_betw_add[simp]: "bij_betw ((\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a) A B \<longleftrightarrow> (\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a ` A = B"
lemma add_diff_cancel_left[simp]: "(c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a) \<ominus>\<^sub>a (c \<oplus>\<^sub>a b) = a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b"
lemma add_diff_cancel_right[simp]: "(a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) \<ominus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) = a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b"
lemma diff_right_commute: "a \<ominus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a b = a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a c"
translations:
lemma left_commute[tts_ac_simps, tts_algebra_simps, field_simps]: 
  "b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
    a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
    a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c =
    a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c

proof (state)
this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
    a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c

proof (prove)
using this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
    a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)

proof (state)
this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c)

goal:
No subgoals!

locale cancel_semigroup = semigroup f for f :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a" +
  assumes add_left_imp_eq: "f a b = f a c \<Longrightarrow> b = c"
  assumes add_right_imp_eq: "f b a = f c a \<Longrightarrow> b = c"
locale cancel_semigroup_syntax = semigroup_syntax f for f :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a"

locale cancel_semigroup_add = cancel_semigroup plus 
  for plus :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a"
begin

locale cancel_semigroup_mult = cancel_semigroup times 
  for times :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a"
begin

locale cancel_semigroup_pair = 
  alg\<^sub>a: cancel_semigroup f\<^sub>a + alg\<^sub>b: cancel_semigroup f\<^sub>b 
  for f\<^sub>a :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a" and f\<^sub>b :: "'b \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> 'b"
begin

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. semigroup_pair f\<^sub>a f\<^sub>b

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cancel_semigroup_pair f\<^sub>b f\<^sub>a

locale cancel_semigroup_pair_syntax = semigroup_pair_syntax f\<^sub>a f\<^sub>b
  for f\<^sub>a :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a" and f\<^sub>b :: "'b \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> 'b"
lemma add_left_cancel[simp]: "a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<longleftrightarrow> b = c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) = (b = c)
lemma add_right_cancel[simp]: "b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<longleftrightarrow> b = c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a) = (b = c)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on ((\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a) A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on (\<lambda>b. b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a) A
lemma bij_betw_add[simp]: "bij_betw ((\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a) A B \<longleftrightarrow> (\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a ` A = B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bij_betw ((\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a) A B = ((\<oplus>\<^sub>a) a ` A = B)

locale cancel_comm_semigroup = comm: comm_semigroup f + binary_op fi 
  for f fi :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a" +
  assumes add_diff_cancel_left'[simp]: "fi (f a b) a = b"
    and diff_diff_add[tts_algebra_simps, tts_field_simps]: 
    "fi (fi a b) c = fi a (f b c)"

locale cancel_comm_semigroup_syntax = comm_semigroup_syntax f + binary_op fi 
  for f fi :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a"
begin

locale cancel_comm_semigroup_add = cancel_comm_semigroup plus minus 
  for plus minus :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a"
begin

locale cancel_comm_semigroup_mult = cancel_comm_semigroup times divide 
  for times divide :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a"
begin

locale cancel_comm_semigroup_pair = 
  alg\<^sub>a: cancel_comm_semigroup f\<^sub>a fi\<^sub>a + alg\<^sub>b: cancel_comm_semigroup f\<^sub>b fi\<^sub>b
  for f\<^sub>a fi\<^sub>a :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> 'a" and f\<^sub>b fi\<^sub>b :: "'b \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> 'b"
begin

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. comm_semigroup_pair f\<^sub>a f\<^sub>b
sublocale rev: cancel_comm_semigroup_pair f\<^sub>b fi\<^sub>b f\<^sub>a fi\<^sub>a

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cancel_comm_semigroup_pair f\<^sub>b fi\<^sub>b f\<^sub>a fi\<^sub>a

locale cancel_comm_semigroup_pair_syntax = 
  comm_semigroup_pair_syntax f\<^sub>a f\<^sub>b + binary_op fi\<^sub>a + binary_op fi\<^sub>b
  for f\<^sub>a fi\<^sub>a f\<^sub>b fi\<^sub>b
begin

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a b = a

proof (prove)
using this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b = a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a b = a

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<Longrightarrow> b = c
 2. \<And>b a c.
       b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<Longrightarrow> b = c

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<Longrightarrow> b = c
 2. \<And>b a c.
       b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<Longrightarrow> b = c

proof (state)
this:
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<Longrightarrow> b = c
 2. \<And>b a c.
       b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<Longrightarrow> b = c

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c
have "a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a a = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a a"

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a a =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a a

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b = a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<Longrightarrow> b = c
 2. \<And>b a c.
       b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<Longrightarrow> b = c

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a a =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a a

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a a =
  a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a a

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:
  b = c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b a c.
       b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<Longrightarrow> b = c

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b a c.
       b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<Longrightarrow> b = c

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (chain)
picking this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a
have "b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<ominus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<ominus>\<^sub>a a"

using this:
  b \<oplus>\<^sub>a a = c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a

goal (1 subgoal):

lemma add_diff_cancel_left[simp]: "(c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a) \<ominus>\<^sub>a (c \<oplus>\<^sub>a b) = a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<ominus>\<^sub>a (c \<oplus>\<^sub>a b) =
    a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. c \<oplus>\<^sub>a a \<ominus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a b =
    a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b
lemma add_diff_cancel_right[simp]: "(a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) \<ominus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) = a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
    a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?a \<ominus>\<^sub>a ?b =
  ?c \<oplus>\<^sub>a ?a \<ominus>\<^sub>a (?c \<oplus>\<^sub>a ?b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<oplus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a (b \<oplus>\<^sub>a c) =
    a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b
lemma diff_right_commute: "a \<ominus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a b = a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<ominus>\<^sub>a c \<ominus>\<^sub>a b =
    a \<ominus>\<^sub>a b \<ominus>\<^sub>a c

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cancel_semigroup_pair f\<^sub>a f\<^sub>b
